stimulusHtml: In Il-Khanid courtly culture, the figure of Bahram Gur from the Bahram Gur Fights the Karg folio in the Great Il-Khanid Shahnama would have symbolized
choicesHtml: the rebirth or reincarnation of a soul after death
loyalty to those who reign with divine approval
civilized rule overcoming turmoil or disarray
the importance of spirituality over material wealth
